Activity: Arrive at the office. Grab a coffee, quick scan of emails. Today, is time to focus on the polish of the work.
Review feedback from @Ldes-1 on the overall flow and pacing. Address any remaining issues.
Polish the level. Fix any bugs, smooth out any rough edges, and generally make the level feel as good as possible.
Optimization. Examine the level performance and try to optimize the level to ensure that it runs smoothly on the target hardware.
Final playtest. Play through the level one last time to make sure everything is working as intended.
Prepare the level for handoff. Organize the files, write documentation, and generally make sure that the level is easy for others to work with.
Submit the level to the build engineer for integration into the main game. Send Email to @beng-1. Subject: Request to integrate the Level.
Review the game progress with @Ldes-1. Give out the final remarks and future plan of the level design in the game.
Back up work and write a final summary of the week's progress. Call it a week!
